pages.text: One of the highest ranking of all Illagers, the Viziers seems to possess a powerful ruby that amplifies spells and magic.

In battle, they charge upon their target with an Iron Sword multiple times before summoning Fangs upon their feet. When injured, an Irk will be summoned to defend their master, a ranged cousin of the Vex.
Once injured enough, or there are lot of Irks around them, the Vizier will cast a spell that would siphon the life force of all surrounding Irks, healing them in the process.
When slain, their killer will be struck with Bad Omen at it's highest level. There are rumors that the Viziers would grant shards of their mighty ruby to certain Evokers.
